availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lorenzo D. Jenkins (Webster County, Kentucky, soldier.)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Wesley Jenkins and Eliza Jenkins. Resident of Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Union County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the North Cumberland Battalion (U.S.A) as a private from January 4, 1865, to August 28, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 518B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, , p. 435.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 777.
"Lorenzo Dow Jenkins (1848-1934)," Find A Grave, Memorial #80289821, accessed February 18, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/80289821.
